item.title: Procedural Materials - Substance Designer
item.description:
* { box-sizing: border-box; } .img-container-x4 { float: left; width: 25%; padding: 1px; } .img-container-x4:hover img { float: left; width: 150%; padding: 1px; } .clearfix::after { content: ""; clear: both; display: table; } Aged Wood
Muddy with Trails
Bark with Knots and moss
Ground with Roots
